title: How to track someone on Instagram - Quora

response.answer_text: Get to know better people you care for. Keep informed on what your favorite celebrities, kids, boyfriends, girlfriends like on Instagram with our one and only Instagram activity tracker. See anyone's likes on Instagram - they speak tons. Instagram activity history is available for you in beautiful and convenient reports, see report description and examples below! No need to download Insta stalker app, Snoopreport Instagram tracker will show you all insights about someone's activity on Instagram in convenient instagram activity log. Discover your beloved person interests Don't know what present to choose? Want to know more about someone's interests and hobbies? Just see what pictures he or she been liking on Instagram lately to get valuable insights! Snoopreport Instagram tracker will help you see through. Keep your jealousy at bay Have some personal concerns or trust issues? You don't have to stalk and have a peep on gadgets. Track instagram users your boyfriend or girlfriend follow, see whose photos they like with the help of our Instagram tracker. Be closer to your favorite celebrity Check out what celebrities or public figures like on Instagram and get insights about their lifestyle, relationships and even see what time they are active on Instagram. Sometimes it's good to know more about stars. You will be able to tell if someone is active on Instagram just after a one week of tracking them. Keep an eye on your kids interests Track your kids likes and follows on Instagram. Make sure there's nothing potentially harmful. Your parental control is sustained with close monitoring of kids' activity in Instagram.

You can see what posts a person likes and comments on by following them, going into your notification section, and then swiping to the right. Taking a step back, the notification section is divided into two subsections: “You” and "Following". The “You” section generates the orange-pink ♡1 notification icon when anyone likes your post. Swiping the entire section to the right brings you under the “Following” portion of the notification section. This means you are able to see the likes and comments of everyone you follow (excluding their likes of private posts that you might not follow) in a manner that is updated in seconds, chronologically. PS: If you really wanted to track just one person that might be hard if you are following hundreds of people, but easier if you are following very few. Happy Instagraming!
